title: Help finding Font
content:
Here is the Picture of the font I need to find. It is the font used on VIN numbers for Chrysler vehicles (the decals on the driver door).

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [chrysler-font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419135323/http:/typophile.com/files/chrysler-font.jpg) | 193.85 KB |
author: SignstopTyson

comments.content: looking for a mid 1800's cut for and

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419135323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nbommer_font_test_6044.jpg)

looking for a font to match this or something very, very close to it.  
any ideas?

Here [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419135323/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid") is where you ask for IDs.

hhp
